nodes.text: Fengrine was one of several prestigious agri-industrial worlds in the latter years of the Galactic Republic. It was found in the Senex sector in the Fengrine system in the Mid Rim.

It had many hydroponic shells around the surface where the farmers lived a relatively easy life, even getting the label "armchair farming" from offworlders living in harsher climates. The world made a fortune in exports by devoting the entire surface to agriculture.
